VuePress Blog Boilerplate

An ever-evolving and opinionated dev environment for people who want to use VuePress to power their blogs.

Get Started â†’

Blogger First

This framework optimizes the VuePress engine for blogging first and foremost. Includes default features like RSS feed generation, list of recent posts, etc.

Simplicity First

Minimal setup with markdown-centered project structure helps you focus on writing.

Vue.js Powered Engine

Enjoy the dev experience of Vue + webpack, use Vue components in markdown, and develop your theme with Vue
